Interface CardGameUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
BigTwoGUI
public interface CardGameUI
An interface for a general card game user interface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearMsgArea()
    Clears the message area of the card game user interface.
    void
    disable()
    Disables user interactions.
    void
    enable()
    Enables user interactions.
    void
    printMsg(String msg)
    Prints the specified string to the message area of the card game user interface.
    void
    promptActivePlayer()
    Prompts active player to select cards and make his/her move.
    void
    repaint()
    Repaints the user interface.
    void
    reset()
    Resets the card game user interface.
    void
    setActivePlayer(int activePlayer)
    Sets the index of the active player (i.e., the current player).

  • Method Details

    • setActivePlayer

      void setActivePlayer(int activePlayer)
      Sets the index of the active player (i.e., the current player).
      Parameters:
      activePlayer - an int value representing the index of the active player

    • repaint

      void repaint()
      Repaints the user interface.

    • printMsg

      void printMsg(String msg)
      Prints the specified string to the message area of the card game user interface.
      Parameters:
      msg - the string to be printed to the message area of the card game user interface

    • clearMsgArea

      void clearMsgArea()
      Clears the message area of the card game user interface.

    • reset

      void reset()
      Resets the card game user interface.

    • enable

      void enable()
      Enables user interactions.

    • disable

      void disable()
      Disables user interactions.

    • promptActivePlayer

      void promptActivePlayer()
      Prompts active player to select cards and make his/her move.
